[:page: PageHeader][:toc:]
+ Example Quotation Symbols

Examples for quotation symbols are:

"
'''
//
/////
\\

The example in ExampleInsertPage can therefore also be written as:

<<
[:page:"ScratchPad"]
[:page:'''ScratchPad''']
[:page://ScratchPad//]
[:page://///ScratchPad/////]
[:page:\\ScratchPad\\]
>>
